subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Islanders goalie Jaroslav Halak, who routinely torments Washington in elimination games, turned in another strong effort but could not stop Evgeny Kuznetsov 12:42 into the third period.
snippet: Islanders goalie Jaroslav Halak, who routinely torments Washington in elimination games, turned in another strong effort but could not stop Evgeny Kuznetsov 12:42 into the third period.
